title: NY Times
content:
Does anyone know what typeface the New York Times uses for their online edition?

[http://www.nytimes.com/2008/08/15/world/europe/15georgia.html?\_r=1&hp&oref=slogin](http://web.archive.org/web/20131105073927/http:/www.nytimes.com/2008/08/15/world/europe/15georgia.html?_r=1&hp&oref=slogin)

The typeface used for the text in the article itself is what I am curious about.

Thanks!
author: Carolann

comments.content: Which part? Maybe link to a page and give us a word.
